subTitle: We answer your questions about our transport and logistics services.

faqs.question: What geographic areas does TransCar cover?
faqs.answer: TransCar offers transport services primarily in Catalonia, with complete coverage in Barcelona, Girona, Lleida, and Tarragona. With our Premium Plan, we also offer services throughout mainland Spain.

faqs.question: How can I track my shipment?
faqs.answer: All our customers receive a unique tracking code for each shipment. With the Basic Plan, you can check the current status of your shipment on our website. Premium customers enjoy real-time tracking with instant updates via SMS or email.

faqs.question: What is the estimated delivery time?
faqs.answer: For shipments within Catalonia, we guarantee deliveries within 24-48 hours. For the rest of Spain (Premium Plan), the estimated time is 48-72 hours. In urgent cases, we offer same-day delivery services for Premium customers in certain areas.

faqs.question: What types of goods can be transported?
faqs.answer: We transport a wide variety of goods, from general parcels to specialized products. However, there are restrictions for hazardous materials, perishables, or extremely high-value items. Contact us to inquire about your specific case.

faqs.question: How are incidents or delays managed?
faqs.answer: We have a dedicated team for incident resolution. Basic Plan customers can contact us by email, while Premium customers have access to priority telephone support 24/7. Our incident resolution rate in less than 24 hours exceeds 95%.

faqs.question: Does TransCar offer customized services for businesses?
faqs.answer: Yes, in addition to our standard plans, we offer tailored solutions for companies with specific logistics needs. This includes scheduled pickups, dedicated fleet management, or integration with management systems. Request a personalized consultation and we will offer you a budget adapted to your needs.
